products.name: Puma socks
products.description: Step up your game with Puma Performance Socks, designed for all-day comfort and a perfect fit. Crafted from a breathable, moisture-wicking fabric blend, these socks keep your feet cool, dry, and fresh—whether you’re at the gym, on the field, or running errands.

products.name: Apple laptop
products.description: Apple 2024 MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip with 10‑core CPU and 10‑core GPU: Built for Apple Intelligence, 35.97 cm (14.2″) Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver
